page.title: 14CILFFRIW,A WELSH VILLAGE - 2
page.content: The most interesting shop in my village is the{Post Office.}It is a small,homely place and it sells sweets,birthday cards,and almost anything you want. Some of my friends sell papers from this shop. The building is about{60 years old. } There is also an interesting chapel in Cilffriw,called{Pisgah Chapel.}It was erected in 1930 and there are two services held there every Sunday and also a Sunday School. However,the {congregation has decreased}in number; infact,by 162 members in the last 50 years. We have a{Community Centre}in the village which is used almost every night of the week. It is only 20 years old and the activities cater for nearly all types,ranging from Karate to Bingo and Darts.
